reviews.text: Worst bank ever i seen don't open account here and also don't deposit u wait more than 2 h for 1 deposit i hass never seen this type of service worst server ever ( i have been here 12pm and i am going from here 2pm I don't have only 1 work that i waste my time here to deposit i also have work to do ) again i tell never come here

Worst bank...I don't recommend any one to open their account in this Haibowal branch.The cashier is not active and works very slow,this causes a lot of inconvenince to the customers.We have stand in long queue waiting for our turn as she takes 30-40 minutes at one customer.I request to kindly change the staff.
Very bad service.. cash counter, senior cashier mam looks like uneducated one... She takes almost 30 minutes for one customer.....
Very bad service bekar h band kr do band

worst bank especially the staff here is so so rude that they will not help you instead they will try to say you bad words once i had problem and when i asked them to help they were trying to ignore i think because they are working in a public sector bank and they think nobody will ever ask them anything about their careless behaviour and there is no supervision on them .....
No value of customer's time! No updated technology! Long wait time and always their staff is on leave
Service is even worse than a 3rd class bank..Goshh, so slow and unhelpful they are
Staff is very helpful... No long queues ever..
